Paper.Title: Proceedings of the ACL Workshop on Intrinsic and Extrinsic Evaluation Measures for Machine Translation and/or Summarization, pages 49-56, Ann Arbor, June 2005. c(c)2005 Association for Computational Linguistics Evaluating DUC 2004 Tasks with the QARLA Framework

Section.Paragraph: This papers reports the application of the QARLA evaluation framework to the DUC 2004 testbed (tasks 2 and 5). Our experiment addresses two issues: how well QARLA evaluation measures correlate with human judgements, and what additional insights can be provided by the QARLA framework to the DUC evaluation exercises.
